description: Try our easy to follow Grilled Chicken & Peach Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Grilled Chicken & Peach Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat chargrill pan on mediumhigh. Brush chicken with oil and season. Halve fruit, remove stone and cut into wedges.

Cook chicken on chargrill for about 56 minutes each side until cooked through. Transfer to a warm plate. Add peach wedges to pan and cook for about 1 minute each side until lightly charred. Transfer to a plate.
Whisk oil, balsamic vinegar, honey and ginger together in a bowl. Slice chicken breasts. Arrange rocket, onion, peach, pecans and chicken on plates. Drizzle dressing over. Serve.
